text: Ra yo kura pani usaka nisaniharumadhye ho ki timile dekhchau ki dharati thici'eko cha, ani jaba hami tyasama pani varsa'umchaum taba tyo harabhara bha'era uthnathalcha. Niscaya nai jasale usala'i jivita garyo murdaharula'i jivita garnevala cha. Nihsandeha usala'i hareka kuraharumathi samathrya prapta cha
